catalogue_raissonne: Torii Kiyonaga sakuhin sōmokuroku, Chiba, 2007, no. 434-a; Hirano, no. 397
creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
description: a woman standing under a tree wearing a straw hat and holding a fan
inscription: {Utsukushii / Ue nimo yoku wo / Tashinami te} (A beautiful woman / Is more attractive if she is / Seduced by her desire)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Woman with a hat walking under a tree
